## Interaction with Contract

### Setters

Mint tokens to itself: `[0x0370D871f1D4B256E753120221F3Be87A40bd246, bytes32("nft 1"), bytes32("good nft")]`

```sh
❯ cast send $SPNFT "mint(address,bytes32,bytes32)" 0x0370D871f1D4B256E753120221F3Be87A40bd246 0x226e667420312200000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 0x22676f6f64206e66742200000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY

blockHash               0x5510a843d253da603f5283008b60142f6cec04c46e38343e1d087853a2b7822d
blockNumber             4137873
contractAddress
cumulativeGasUsed       869861
effectiveGasPrice       7401786764
gasUsed                 21892
logs                    []
logsBloom               
root
status                  1
transactionHash         0xb1642ce0072b167a34b708226d2ed6918088968e2b4119151e47d0453c416cf6
transactionIndex        10
type                    2
```

---

TODO:

### Getters

#### name

```sh
❯ cast call $SPNFT "name()" --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL
0x
```

#### symbol

```sh
❯ cast call $SPNFT "symbol()" --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL
```

#### tokenURI

```sh
❯ cast call $SPNFT "tokenURI(uint256)" 1 --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL
```

### Utilities

#### Get nonce

```sh
❯ cast nonce $(cast wallet address $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY) --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL
108
```

## Resources

- [Online String to Bytes32 Solidity Converter](https://www.devoven.com/string-to-bytes32)
- [Online Bytes32 to String Solidity Converter](https://www.devoven.com/bytes32-to-string)
